item.title: Words_Day1
item.description: English Chinese Detailed Explanation in English smattering 一知半解、肤浅的知识 superficial knowledge obliging 乐于助人的 willing to do favors antic 古怪、滑稽 characterized by absurdity and clownish behaviors fastidious 1.严苛的、苛求的 2.一丝不苟的、细致的 1.having high standards 2.reflecting a meticulous,sensitive or demanding attitudes colossal 巨大的 suggesting the incredible extent,power or effect of a bulk malodorous 1.难闻的 2.不得体的 1.having a bad odor 2.highly improper plaintive 悲伤的 expressive of suffering or sadness enthrall 吸引、使着迷 to hold spellbound opulent 富裕的、大量的 amply or plentifully provided often to the point of ostentaion inimical 有害的、敌对的 having the disposition of an enemy rescind 废除、使无效 to make void by action of a superior authority exponent 支持者、典型 one that champions or exemplifies
